title: LDAP Authenticate Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the `authenticate` operation in the LDAP connector.

payload.description: Response for the `authenticate` method. Indicates success or failure of the authentication.

success.description: Indicates whether the authentication was successful.

message.description: Optional message with additional details about the authentication result.

statusCode.description: HTTP-like status code representing the result of the operation. For example, 200 for success or 400 for invalid input.

headers.description: Headers related to the operation response. May be empty for LDAP operations.
